paper_title: Pathwise turnpike and dissipativity results for discrete-time stochastic linear-quadratic optimal control problems
abstract: We investigate pathwise turnpike behavior of discrete-time stochastic linear-quadratic optimal control problems. Our analysis is based on a novel strict dissipativity notion for such problems, in which a stationary stochastic process replaces the optimal steady state of the deterministic setting. The analytical findings are illustrated by a numerical example.
